paper_abstract: Based on the well-known discrete definitions we introduce a continuous framework for percentile rank scores and integrated impact indicators (I3). This is done by taking the integral of a scoring function multiplied by a distribution function. Examples are provided by considering several distribution functions and two scoring functions, where the distribution function can take any form and the scoring function is non-decreasing.
paper_title: Modelling Continuous Percentile Rank Scores and Integrated Impact Indicators (I3)
